lyrics.lyric: Older
lyrics.tlyric: 长大后

lyrics.lyric: I used to shut my door
lyrics.tlyric: 我曾紧关房门

lyrics.lyric: When my mother screamed in the kitchen
lyrics.tlyric: 把妈妈在厨房的叫喊声隔绝门外

lyrics.lyric: I'd turn the music up
lyrics.tlyric: 我把音乐开的超大声

lyrics.lyric: Get high and try not to listen
lyrics.tlyric: 尝试沉浸其中而不理会妈妈的声音

lyrics.lyric: To every little fight
lyrics.tlyric: 即使是每个微不足道的争吵

lyrics.lyric: 'Cause neither one was right
lyrics.tlyric: 因为都不承认是自己错了

lyrics.lyric: I swore I’d never be like them
lyrics.tlyric: 我发誓永远不会变成像他们一样的人

lyrics.lyric: But I was just a kid back then
lyrics.tlyric: 但那时我只是一个孩子

lyrics.lyric: The older I get, the more that I see
lyrics.tlyric: 年纪渐长 阅历增多

lyrics.lyric: My parents aren't heroes, they're just like me
lyrics.tlyric: 父母也不是英雄 他们只是像我一样

lyrics.lyric: And loving is hard, it don't always work
lyrics.tlyric: 爱一个人很难 并不总是顺风顺水

lyrics.lyric: You just try your best not to get hurt
lyrics.tlyric: 你只能竭尽所能保护自己不受伤害

lyrics.lyric: I used to be mad, but now I know
lyrics.tlyric: 我曾很气愤 但现在我明白

lyrics.lyric: Sometimes it's better to let someone go
lyrics.tlyric: 有时候放下是更好的选择

lyrics.lyric: It just hadn't hit me yet
lyrics.tlyric: 当时的我并没有意识到

lyrics.lyric: The older I get
lyrics.tlyric: 长大后才明白这一切

lyrics.lyric: I used to wonder why
lyrics.tlyric: 我曾感到困惑

lyrics.lyric: Why they could never be happy
lyrics.tlyric: 为何父母总是无法绽放笑颜

lyrics.lyric: I used to close my eyes
lyrics.tlyric: 我曾经闭上双眼

lyrics.lyric: And pray for a whole another family
lyrics.tlyric: 祈祷着另一个完全不同的家庭

lyrics.lyric: Where everything was fine
lyrics.tlyric: 一个事事如意的家庭

lyrics.lyric: One that felt like mine
lyrics.tlyric: 一个让我有归属感的家庭

lyrics.lyric: I swore I’d never be like them
lyrics.tlyric: 我发誓永远不会变成像他们一样的人

lyrics.lyric: But I was just a kid back then
lyrics.tlyric: 但那时我只是一个孩子

lyrics.lyric: The older I get, the more that I see
lyrics.tlyric: 年纪渐长 阅历增多

lyrics.lyric: My parents aren't heroes, they're just like me
lyrics.tlyric: 我明白 父母也不是英雄 我们都只是普通人

lyrics.lyric: And loving is hard, it don't always work
lyrics.tlyric: 爱一个人很难 并不总是顺风顺水

lyrics.lyric: You just try your best not to get hurt
lyrics.tlyric: 你只能竭尽所能保护自己不受伤害

lyrics.lyric: I used to be mad, but now I know
lyrics.tlyric: 我曾很气愤 但现在我明白

lyrics.lyric: Sometimes it's better to let someone go
lyrics.tlyric: 有时候放下是更好的选择

lyrics.lyric: It just hadn't hit me yet
lyrics.tlyric: 当时的我并没有意识到

lyrics.lyric: The older I get
lyrics.tlyric: 长大后才明白这一切

lyrics.lyric: The older I get, the more that I see
lyrics.tlyric: 年纪渐长 阅历增多

lyrics.lyric: My parents aren't heroes, they're just like me
lyrics.tlyric: 我明白 父母也不是英雄 我们都只是普通人

lyrics.lyric: And loving is hard, it don't always work
lyrics.tlyric: 爱一个人很难 并不总是顺风顺水

lyrics.lyric: You just try your best not to get hurt
lyrics.tlyric: 你只能竭尽所能保护自己不受伤害

lyrics.tlyric: 我曾很气愤 但现在我明白

lyrics.lyric: Sometimes it's better to let someone go
lyrics.tlyric: 有时候放下是更好的选择

lyrics.tlyric: 当时的我并没有意识到

lyrics.lyric: The older I get

lrc.lyric:
[00:00.00] 作词 : Sasha Alex Sloan/Henry Agincourt Allen/Daniel Silberstein
[00:00.12] 作曲 : Sasha Alex Sloan/Henry Agincourt Allen/Daniel Silberstein
[00:00.24] 编曲 : King Henry
[00:00.36] 制作人 : King Henry
[00:00.48]I used to shut my door
[00:04.22]When my mother screamed in the kitchen
[00:08.07]I'd turn the music up
[00:11.91]Get high and try not to listen
[00:14.51]To every little fight
[00:18.01]'Cause neither one was right
[00:22.00]I swore I’d never be like them
[00:25.74]But I was just a kid back then
[00:28.80]The older I get, the more that I see
[00:32.33]My parents aren't heroes, they're just like me
[00:36.12]And loving is hard, it don't always work
[00:39.93]You just try your best not to get hurt
[00:43.62]I used to be mad, but now I know
[00:47.39]Sometimes it's better to let someone go
[00:51.13]It just hadn't hit me yet
[00:54.81]The older I get
[00:57.08]I used to wonder why
[01:00.43]Why they could never be happy
[01:04.50]I used to close my eyes
[01:08.03]And pray for a whole 'nother family
[01:10.80]Where everything was fine
[01:13.84]One that felt like mine
[01:18.41]I swore I’d never be like them
[01:21.86]But I was just a kid back then
[01:25.03]The older I get, the more that I see
[01:28.55]My parents aren't heroes, they're just like me
[01:32.35]And loving is hard, it don't always work
[01:36.13]You just try your best not to get hurt
[01:39.89]I used to be mad, but now I know
[01:43.60]Sometimes it's better to let someone go
[01:47.32]It just hadn't hit me yet
[01:51.07]The older I get
[02:06.14]The older I get, the more that I see
[02:09.79]My parents aren't heroes, they're just like me
[02:13.68]And loving is hard, it don't always work
[02:17.37]You just try your best not to get hurt
[02:21.08]I used to be mad, but now I know
[02:24.90]Sometimes it's better to let someone go
[02:28.60]It just hadn't hit me yet
[02:32.35]The older I get
[02:34.70]

tlyric.lyric:
[by:Trap_Girl]
[00:00.48]我曾紧关房门
[00:04.22]把妈妈在厨房的叫喊声隔绝门外
[00:08.07]我把音乐开的超大声
[00:11.91]尝试沉浸其中而不理会妈妈的声音
[00:14.51]即使是每个微不足道的争吵
[00:18.01]他们都不承认是自己错了
[00:22.00]我发誓永远不会变成像他们一样的人
[00:25.74]但那时我只是一个孩子
[00:28.80]年纪渐长 阅历增多
[00:32.33]我明白 父母也不是英雄 他们只是像我一样
[00:36.12]爱一个人很难 并不总是顺风顺水
[00:39.93]你只能竭尽所能保护自己不受伤害
[00:43.62]我曾无法理解 但现在我明白
[00:47.39]有时候放下是更好的选择
[00:51.13]当时的我阅历尚浅
[00:54.81]长大后才明白这一切
[00:57.08]我曾感到困惑
[01:00.43]为何父母总是无法绽放笑颜
[01:04.50]我曾经闭上双眼
[01:08.03]祈祷可以生活在另一个家庭
[01:10.80]另一个事事如意的家庭
[01:13.84]另一个让我有归属感的家庭
[01:18.41]我发誓永远不会变成像他们一样的人
[01:21.86]但那时我只是一个孩子
[01:25.03]年纪渐长 阅历增多
[01:28.55]我明白 父母也不是英雄 我们都只是普通人
[01:32.35]爱一个人很难 并不总是顺风顺水
[01:36.13]你只能竭尽所能保护自己不受伤害
[01:39.89]我曾无法理解 但现在我明白
[01:43.60]有时候放下是更好的选择
[01:47.32]当时的我阅历尚浅
[01:51.07]长大后才明白这一切
[02:06.14]年纪渐长 阅历增多
[02:09.79]我明白 父母也不是英雄 我们都只是普通人
[02:13.68]爱一个人很难 并不总是顺风顺水
[02:17.37]你只能竭尽所能保护自己不受伤害
[02:21.08]我曾无法理解 但现在我明白
[02:24.90]有时候放下是更好的选择
[02:28.60]当时的我阅历尚浅
[02:32.35]长大后才明白这一切
[02:34.70]
